Synonym: Acra8; Acetylcholine Receptor Alpha 8; CHRNA; Cholinergic receptor nicotinic alpha 8
Neuronal acetylcholine receptor subunit.Definition: This receptor it a protein that is a translation product of the CHRNA8 gene or a 1:1 ortholog thereof. NACHRA8 is a type of nicotinic acetylcholine receptor, consisting entirely of α8 subunits. This is the a type of neuronal-type II receptor subtype and these receptors are most present with in the brain.
